gmcm.enabled.name: Enable mod
gmcm.enabled.tooltip: If off, the mod does nothing.
gmcm.useMinigame.name: Use Reel Tension minigame
gmcm.useMinigame.tooltip: If off, fishing uses the vanilla minigame even if the mod is enabled.
gmcm.legendaryVanilla.name: Use vanilla for legendary/boss fish
gmcm.legendaryVanilla.tooltip: If on, legendary/boss fish will use the vanilla fishing minigame.
gmcm.section.tension.tooltip: Tuning for the new fishing minigame.
gmcm.safeZone.name: Safe zone size
gmcm.safeZone.tooltip: Bigger = easier. This is scaled down for harder fish.
gmcm.tensionUp.name: Tension up rate
gmcm.tensionUp.tooltip: How fast the needle rises while holding Use Tool.
gmcm.tensionDown.name: Tension down rate
gmcm.tensionDown.tooltip: How fast the needle falls while not holding Use Tool.
gmcm.catchGain.name: Catch gain rate
gmcm.catchGain.tooltip: How quickly you catch the fish while staying in the safe zone.
gmcm.catchLoss.name: Catch loss rate
gmcm.catchLoss.tooltip: How quickly the fish escapes while outside the safe zone.
gmcm.section.treasure.tooltip: Optional treasure handling inside the new minigame.
gmcm.treasureEnable.name: Enable treasure minigame
gmcm.treasureEnable.tooltip: If off, treasure is handled by vanilla behavior only.
gmcm.treasureDelay.name: Treasure delay
gmcm.treasureDelay.tooltip: How many seconds before treasure becomes collectible.
gmcm.treasureGain.name: Treasure gain rate
gmcm.treasureGain.tooltip: How quickly the treasure meter fills while collecting.
gmcm.treasureLoss.name: Treasure loss rate
gmcm.treasureLoss.tooltip: How quickly the treasure meter falls when you're not collecting.
minigame.title: Reel Tension
minigame.instruction.reel: Hold Use Tool to raise tension. Release to lower it. Stay in the green zone!
minigame.instruction.treasure: Hold Shift to collect treasure (while staying in the zone).
